resources.string: How many pairs can you memorize?\n Select a difficulty or make your own map.\n

How many pairs can you memorize?
 Easy has up to 4 different digits.
 Increase letters to maximize your possible score!

How many pairs can you memorize?
 Medium has up to 7 different digits.
 Increase letters to maximize your possible score!

How many pairs can you memorize?
 Hard has up to 10 different digits.
 Increase letters to maximize your possible score!
